package.name: StrongTics_RichSnippets
package.summary: StrongTics RichSnippets allows you to increase your Search Engine Visibility with Schema.org main markups.
package.description:
Make your business easy-to-find on Google, Yahoo!, Bing & more!

If you are in a competitive online market, to make money, it is necessary to ensure that customers can easily find you, your products and Services you offer.
StrongTics RichSnippets Suite will increase your search rankings, and get guaranteed exposure FAST.

This extension is based on Schema.org markups, the leader and standard technology for semantic markup of data on the web, implemented by the search systems Google, Bing and Yahoo!

It contains only useful markups for eCommerce that are: Organization markup, Authorship markup, Publisher markup, Breadcrumb markup, Product markup, Review markup, Aggregate Rating markup.

Module Compatibility:

This extension was developed following best practices according to Magento standards.
It is simple, fluid and doesn't impact or require any change of Magento default core files or whatever.

The extension full supports Magento Community.

Module Features:

It is fully customisable, you've got possibility to:

- Easy to use:
A single Enable/Disable options for the entiere extension.

- Flexible and Intelligent use of Markups:
For each markups you can decided to Enable/Disable:
1- Organization markup,
2- Authorship markup,
3- Publisher markup,
4- Breadcrumb markup,
5- Product markup,
6- Review markup,
7- Aggregate Rating markup.

- Multiple stores support:
Support multiple stores, multiple languages and multiple domains.

Module Set up Requirements:

- Rich Snippets Global Activation:
1- The entiere extension activation is manage at this point, to start enabled it.
2- Setup your Google+ profile link.

- Setting for Author Rich Snippets
To get Authorship markup enabled it.

- Setting for Breadcrumbs Rich Snippets
To get Breadcrumb markup enabled it.

- Setting for Organization Logo Rich Snippets
This markup requires that following the information be pre-setted:
- Store Name, Phone, Country and Store Contact Address (at Admin > System > Configuration > General > General > Store information ),
- Send Emails To (at Admin > System > Configuration > General > Contacts.),
- and Logo Image Source (at Admin > System > Configuration > General > Design > Header).
At least set the store name and the phone number.

You need also to set:
- Store Street Address,
- Store Postal Code Address,
- and Store City Address.

- Setting for Publisher Rich Snippets
To get Publisher markup enabled it.

- Setting for Product Rich Snippets
To get Product markup enabled it. It included Review and Aggregate Rating markups.

Module Tag:

Rich Snippets Suite Extension, Google Rich snippets, Rich Snippets, Structured Data, Schema.org markups.
